description: Extract ores from rocks, which can be used in Smithing or sold. Also includes gem mining and essence mining.

trainingMethods.name: Iron Ore (Powermining)
trainingMethods.location: Al Kharid Mine, Varrock East Mine (3-rock spots)
trainingMethods.notes: Fast XP if dropping ores. Use a 3-rock spot for efficiency.

trainingMethods.name: Motherlode Mine (Lower Level)
trainingMethods.notes: AFK-friendly. Chance for gems and gold nuggets for prospector outfit.

trainingMethods.name: Granite (Powermining)
trainingMethods.notes: Fastest Mining XP in the game, but very click-intensive.

trainingMethods.name: Amethyst
trainingMethods.notes: Highly AFK, good profit. Requires Mining Guild access.
